data.question: What is the general formula for homochiral lanthanide bisphosphonates synthesized in the study?
Which lanthanides were used in the synthesis of homochiral lanthanide bisphosphonates?
data.answer: La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Gd, Tb

data.question: What method was used to determine the enantiomeric excess of the products in the cyanosilylation reactions?
data.answer: 1H NMR analysis on the (+)-α-methoxy-α-trifluoromethylphenylacetic acid [(+)-MTPA] esters of the cyanohydrins.

data.question: What was the yield of mandelonitrile when benzaldehyde was treated with cyanotrimethylsilane in the presence of desolvated 1e?
Is the framework of compounds 1a-g stable upon dehydration and rehydration?
Did the catalytic efficiency between aldehydes of varying sizes suggest that the lamellar lanthanide phosphonates can swell to facilitate substrate transport?
Was the enantioselective separation of racemic trans-1,2-diaminocyclohexane successful in achieving high enantiomeric excess?
What was the enantio-enrichment achieved for S,S-1,2-diaminocyclohexane in the beginning fractions of the separation experiment?
What technique was used for the single-crystal X-ray diffraction study of compound 1f?
What was the weight loss percentage of compound 1g by 90 °C, corresponding to the loss of water molecules?
Are compounds 1a-g isomorphous according to X-ray powder diffraction studies?
Did the catalytic activity tests for compounds 1a-g include the Diels-Alder reaction?
What was the yield of the hemiester obtained from the treatment of meso-2,3-dimethylsuccinic anhydride with methanol in the presence of desolvated 1e?
Was the supernatant obtained from a suspension of 1e free from ligand contamination according to 31P NMR spectroscopy?
What was the largest dimension of the asymmetric channels in the structure of 1f?
Did the products from the catalytic reactions using 1e exhibit high enantiomeric excess?
What was the enantio-enrichment achieved for R,R-1,2-diaminocyclohexane in the ending fractions of the separation experiment?
Can the catalysts used in the study be recovered in quantitative yields and reused without loss of catalytic activity?
What was the purpose of treating the dehydrated sample of 1e with anhydrous ammonia gas?
data.answer: For enantioselective separation of racemic trans-1,2-diaminocyclohexane

data.question: Was the presence of both Lewis and Brönsted acid sites in compounds 1a-g crucial for their catalytic activity?
